pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Shiny User Interface of Time Warping for Improved Gradient Matching // Interactive shiny application to perform inference of non-linear differential equations via gradient matching. Three (Lotka-Volterra, Fitz hugh Nagumo, and Biopathway) pre- defined models are provided, and users can also load their own models (in the Systems Biology Markup Language format) into the application.
